# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/README ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/README ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug_805.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_805.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug_805.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_805.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_805.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/colpitts_osc1.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/colpitts_osc1.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/colpitts_osc2.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/colpitts_osc2.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/colpitts_osc3.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/colpitts_osc3.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/exclude ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/exclude ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
add_test(NAME Certification_Tests/BUG_805/bug_805.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug_805.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_805.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_805/bug_805.cir.prn )
set_property(TEST Certification_Tests/BUG_805/bug_805.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;805;lev1bjt")
